english.segment1: Dear God, Surround me as I speak, The bridges that I walk across are weak. Frustrations fill the void that I can't solely bare
english.segment2: Dear God, Don't let me fall apart. You've held me close to you. I have turned away and searched for answers. I can't understand
english.segment3: They say that I can move the mountains. And send them falling to the sea. They say that I can walk on water. If I would follow and believe. With Faith Like a Child
english.segment4: Sometimes, When I feel miles away. And my eyes can't see your face. I wonder if I've grown to lose. The recklessness I walked in light of you
english.segment5: They say that I can move the mountains. And send them crashing to the sea. They say that I can walk on water. If I would follow and believe. With Faith Like a Child
english.segment6: They say that love can heal the broken. They say that hope can make you see. They say that faith can find a Savior. If you would follow and believe. With Faith Like a Child
